1370: Vastraid moved to Cromme straet.C.3 after marriage.
Got married to Gertrudis at age 20 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Riet, at age 21.
1373: Had a son with Gertrudis, Radewijns, at age 23.
1374: Had a son with Gertrudis, Sylof, at age 24.
1375: Had a son with Gertrudis, Hako, at age 25.
1376: Lost son Hako when Hako was 2 years old.
1377: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Ermerut, at age 27.
1378: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Mabelie, at age 28.
1380: Had a son with Gertrudis, Wederic, at age 30.
1382: Had a son with Gertrudis, Galo, at age 32.
1386: Lost daughter Badeloghen when Badeloghen was 0 years old.
Lost his wife Gertrudis and their daughter Badeloghen  while Gertrudis was giving birth when he was 36.
1394: Lost son Sylof when Sylof was 21 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
